biography: Rasmus, a celebrated alumnus of Vihti Golf Club, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While possessing a quiet demeanor off the course, his focus sharpens considerably once he steps onto the tee. He is known to be a very serious player with the will to win.

Rasmus has appeared at the Hector Trophée on one occasion. While he has yet to secure a victory at the Hector Trophée or claim the Victor Trophy, his presence is always noted, and his insights are valued by fellow competitors.
Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, fans will nevertheless remember Rasmus for his dedication to the game.
